overview: In 1307 the Knights Templar were massacred, but they hid a secret treasure map which was discovered in 1945, in Egypt. But it's not until 2003 that Harvard graduate Tom Kans, a code cracker, is called upon to unravel the mysteries of signs hidden in Leonardo Da Vinci's paintings which lead to him deciphering the Templars' secret treasure map!
title: Da Vinci
